lyrics.stanza: We work together with God by a life, We work together with God by a life: All-sufficient, All-mature;
(Brothers) Able to fit (Sisters) All situations, (Brothers) Able to endure (Sisters) Any kind of treatment, (All) To accept any kind of environment; (Brothers) All-fitting life!
Able to work In any condition, To take any kind Of opportunity For the carrying out of our ministry; All-fitting life!
We work together with God by a life, We work together with God by a life: All-sufficient, All-mature; All-sufficient All-mature; All-fitting life.
